attributes.action: Prison sentences to be reduced by10% due to punishment levels of confinement.
attributes.additional_details: With punishment levels of isolation since March,many prisoners are mentally and physically at dangerous levels of health. Many of these people already suffer from mental health issues. As a punishment 42days is a maximum allowed given .10 months and still 23hr bang up .We should give theses people a glimmer of hope and reduce sentences by 10% inline with sentences given during the pandemic. After all these people need to be shown that compliance is rewarded.
attributes.background: Allow 10% of sentence in line with lower sentences given to offenders during the pandemic.

rejection.details:
Decisions about sentencing and parole are a matter for the courts and parole boards, not the Government or House of Commons.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/567457
